meanings.definition: To carry out or do something
meanings.sent1: She commits to finishing her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He commits to helping his friend with the project.
meanings.sent3: The cat commits to chasing the laser pointer all around the room.
meanings.sent4: The sun commits to rising every morning, bringing light to the world.
meanings.sent5: The chef commits to perfecting her signature dish, adding a special touch to each plate.

meanings.definition: To pledge or bind oneself to a certain course of action
meanings.sent1: They commit to attending the weekly meetings without fail.
meanings.sent2: She commits to donating a portion of her earnings to charity every month.
meanings.sent3: The dog commits to guarding the house from squirrels, barking at any intruders.
meanings.sent4: The tree commits to standing tall through all seasons, its roots firmly planted in the ground.
meanings.sent5: He commits to being a loyal friend, always there to offer support and encouragement.

meanings.definition: To engage in a romantic or sexual relationship with someone
meanings.sent1: They commit to being exclusive and building a future together.
meanings.sent2: She commits to her partner, showing love and care in every gesture.
meanings.sent3: The movie star commits to dating only within the industry, avoiding public scandals.
meanings.sent4: The waves commit to the shore, embracing in a dance of ebb and flow.
meanings.sent5: He commits to her completely, cherishing every moment they share.
